# urbanindex

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

calculating the [538 urbanization index](https://fivethirtyeight.com/features/how-urban-or-rural-is-your-state-and-what-does-that-mean-for-the-2020-election/) for each census tract

## inspiration

https://twitter.com/NateSilver538/status/1200498385125433344

## Installation

You can install urbanindex from [github](https://github.com/edavidaja/urbanindex) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE} 
remotes::install.packages("edavidaja/urbanindex")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(urbanindex)
head(pop_within_5_mi)
```
